entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
